name: Pride Parade
description:
The pride parade is tomorrow...
don't be late! Story:

After receiving an unexpected phone call, help Greg to prepare for their first time going to the pride parade.

Controls: Keyboard Controls (Desktop in browser):
  • Interact/confirm :  spacebar / ALT / J / Z  
  • Move: ASWD or Arrow keys
  • Show/Hide Menu (when available):  Enter
Mobile Controls (Phone in browser ):
  • Interact/confirm :  A Button
  • Move: Arrows 
  • Menu (when available):  Start Button
Credits:
